Container.Name: CastSponsorSkip
Container.Overview: A Go program that skips sponsored YouTube content and skippable ads on all local Google Cast devices, using the SponsorBlock API.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: youtube ad skip sponsor sponsorblock cast chromecast google android streaming tv

Config.Name: Categories
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of SponsorBlock categories to skip. See: https://wiki.sponsor.ajay.app/w/Types#Category

Config.Name: YouTube API Key
Config.Description: YouTube API key for fallback video identification (required on some Chromecast devices).

Config.Name: Mute Ads
Config.Description: Mutes the device while an ad is playing.

Config.Name: Skip Sponsors
Config.Description: Toggles sponsored segment skipping via the SponsorBlock API. If disabled, only YouTube ads will be skipped.

Config.Name: Discover Interval
Config.Description: Interval to restart the DNS discovery client.

Config.Name: Paused Interval
Config.Description: Time to wait between each poll of the Cast device status when paused.

Config.Name: Playing Interval
Config.Description: Time to wait between each poll of the Cast device status when playing.

Config.Name: Devices
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of device addresses. This will disable discovery and is not recommended unless discovery fails.
